dcterms:creator: D. J. Cai
A. de Groot
T.-W. Chen
A. Giovannucci
Z. Dong
G. Etter
Z. Ziv
dcterms:description: The UCLA Miniscope V3 is a lightweight, customizable, and open-source miniature microscope designed for neural recording in freely behaving animals, allowing for the tracking of hundreds of neurons simultaneously.
dcterms:title: UCLA Miniscope V3

dcterms:creator: Aharoni Lab
dcterms:description: The UCLA Miniscope V4 is an advanced version of the V3, featuring improvements such as a 1mm diameter field of view, electronic focal adjustment, and reduced excitation power requirements.
dcterms:title: UCLA Miniscope V4

dcterms:creator: A. de Groot
G. Etter
dcterms:description: NINscope is a versatile miniscope designed for multi-region circuit investigations, allowing researchers to study neuronal activity across different brain areas.
dcterms:title: NINscope

dcterms:creator: T.-W. Chen
dcterms:description: GCaMP6s is an ultrasensitive genetically encoded calcium indicator used for imaging neuronal activity, allowing for high-resolution monitoring of calcium transients in neurons.
dcterms:title: GCaMP6s

dcterms:creator: A. Giovannucci
dcterms:description: CalmAn is an open-source tool designed for scalable calcium imaging data analysis, providing methods for preprocessing, registration, and analysis of large-scale calcium imaging datasets.
dcterms:title: CalmAn

dcterms:creator: Z. Dong
dcterms:description: MINIAN is an open-source analysis pipeline for miniscope data, providing tools for extracting calcium events and visualizing results across different brain regions and cell types.
dcterms:title: MINIAN

dcterms:creator: G. Etter
dcterms:description: PIMPN is a Python Integrated Miniscope Pipeline Notebook developed for analyzing calcium images and behavior videos directly in the cloud, facilitating data processing and analysis.
dcterms:title: PIMPN

dcterms:creator: Zivlab
dcterms:description: CellReg is a package designed for cell registration in calcium imaging data, allowing researchers to track the same cells across multiple sessions with high accuracy.
dcterms:title: CellReg

dcterms:creator: K. Kolar
dcterms:description: MESmerize is a platform designed to interact with calcium imaging data analysis, providing a user-friendly interface for motion correction, parameter optimization, and data visualization.
dcterms:title: MESmerize
